name: Crisp Thinking
overview:
Crisp Thinking is the global leader in online community management software. Across territories and languages, in MMOs, Social Media and online spaces, Crisp automates, aggregates, escalates and processes in real time, making it possible to manage communities and reputations across multiple platforms and spaces.

The Crisp Community Management Platform protects users from threats such as spam, griefing, scams, bullying and child predators. It profiles, manages and protects, automating many vital functions and helping keep companies compliant with local legislation such as COPPA in the US.

Operating in multiple languages including English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Swedish, the Crisp Platform is a unique single system solution - the first automated enterprise-level system that helps companies manage and moderate all online content within both private and public online communities.

It has an independently tested accuracy rating of 98.4 per cent in the detection of online predators and has been proven to save more than 80 per cent in moderation costs, allowing companies to bring on huge numbers of new customers without the corresponding rise in customer service / moderation staff.
